channel.title: Seen/Saw Podcast
channel.description: Musician Logan Sorese is terrified of the infinite facelessness of the internet, so in order to face his fear, he's releasing a song weekly (sometimes bi-weekly) during 2018.
channel.itunes:summary: Musician Logan Sorese is terrified of the infinite facelessness of the internet, so in order to face his fear, he's releasing a song weekly (sometimes bi-weekly) during 2018.
channel.itunes:author: Logan Sorese
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly music podcast from Logan Sorese

item.title: Let Me In
item.description: Ahem. Is this thing on? Welcome to Week #1. This week’s song is called “Let Me In” and I’m trying to not be overly precious about it. I say “try” because I’m fighting an intense urge to go back and edit it right now or re-record vocals or scrap this...
item.content:encoded: Ahem. Is this thing on? Welcome to Week #1. This week’s song is called “Let Me In” and I’m trying to not be overly precious about it. I say “try” because I’m fighting an intense urge to go back and edit it right now or re-record vocals or scrap this entire idea. But that’s exactly why I’m uploading as is.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ahem. Is this thing on? Welcome to Week #1. This week’s song is called “Let Me In” and I’m trying to not be overly precious about it. I say “try” because I’m fighting an intense urge to go back and edit it right now or re-record vocals or scrap this...
item.itunes:summary: Ahem. Is this thing on? Welcome to Week #1. This week’s song is called “Let Me In” and I’m trying to not be overly precious about it. I say “try” because I’m fighting an intense urge to go back and edit it right now or re-record vocals or scrap this entire idea. But that’s exactly why I’m uploading as is.
item.itunes:author: Logan Sorese
